title: Amazon Luna is now available to everyone in the US, and it has new features
content:
After launching in early access over one year ago, Amazon has announced that its Luna cloud gaming service is now available to everyone in the mainland United States. Since its initial launch, the service has expanded to more devices, now covering Windows, macOS, Chromebooks, iOS (via the web), Android (including Fire tablets), and Fire TV

The post Amazon Luna is now available to everyone in the US, and it has new features appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Amazon has announced that its Luna cloud gaming service is now fully available in the mainland United States, with new channels and features.
